knimeNode.name: Google Analytics Connection
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a connection to the Google Analytics API.

fullDescription.intro:
Create a connection to the Google Analytics API.
For details see: developers.google.com/analytics/resources/concepts/gaConceptsAccounts.
fullDescription.option: The profile ID that will be used for this connection.

ports.inPort: The Google API connection that will be used.
ports.outPort: A connection that can be used to access the Google Analytics API.
